Title: Distractions
Plot: Hiro deals with explaining his new heroic path in life to his ambitious sister and tycoon father. Niki has the chance to reunite with D.L and Micah. Claude's mentoring of Peter leads Peter to question those closest to him. Claire goes to a trailer park looking for her birth mother. Sylar wears a disguise and makes a move against HRG.
GuestStars: Jessalyn Gilsig, Link Baker, Monica Louwerens, Kevin Chamberlin, Paula Newsome, Saemi Nakamura
